version_description:
Remove build number of version in menu setting.
Fixed iOS 9 crash issue.
Fixed error banner showing please login again.

- Merchant names (if available) will be displayed in Notification screen.
- Unintended spaces at the start and end of phone numbers and References are auto-removed for user convenience in Send Money.
Fixed minor bug in notification causing empty notification screen.

- bKash App is now more secure than ever, because of verification of your account before PIN input.
- "Buy Airtime" service will be known as "Mobile Recharge" from now on.
+ Use the new Pay Bill feature in bKash App to pay for utility bills and other services, right from the comfort of your home.

+ Get notification on, and see the reflection of your bank-to-bKash fund transfers (Deposit from iBanking) Statements and Limits.
+ Now you can select your mobile operator in Mobile Recharge, in case you have changed your operator, or plan to do so in the future.

+ Improved performance and user experience
+ Introducing the new bKash App, with a fresh look, and exciting features
+ Explore bKash without an account, and register a new one in a few minutes
+ Scan any bKash QR from home screen for faster transaction
+ See the best bKash offers near you
+ Use shortcuts for your most frequent transactions in My bKash
+ Find suggestions from bKash on what other services you can try out
+ See all your recent transactions and promotions in Inbox

+ Fixed iOS 13 compatibility issues
+ You will now find a blinking cursor in PIN field for your convenience
+ Improved performance
+ We fixed some bugs for improving your experience of bKash App.

+ You can now pay for XI Class Admission fee to the Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Bangladesh. You can find it in the Biller list of the Pay Bill service.

+ You can now find the Refer a Friend service inside bKash Menu.

+ Add Money to any valid bKash customer account from your VISA debit or credit card super easily.

+ Shop for different products from the Shopping service of bKash App, and get them delivered to your doorstep.

+ You can now pay your City Bank AMEX credit card bill from the Pay Bill service.
+ Who wants to remember random bill account numbers just to pay bills? We know you don't. Now save your regular bill accounts for faster bill payments.
+ New PIN setup, and resetting PIN can now be done through app.

+ Your friend doesn't have a bKash account? No worries! You can now Send Money to people without accounts. All they have to do is register a bKash account within a certain time to receive the money.
+ You'll see several new banks in Bank to bKash section of Add Money.
+ We fixed some bugs to improve your app experience.

+ Bored at home? Play Bird Game in bKash App to win exciting prizes. Prizes are available only for a few days.
+ We've introduced your very own QR code. Others can scan it to Send Money to you quickly.
+ Wanna know how to pay your bills? Watch tutorial videos and sample images in Pay Bill to learn how.
+ There's a cool new way to know more about bKash services. Check out Discover bKash in bKash Menu.
+ Feeling hungry? Check out the new Food service, and pay for delicious food there.

+ Thinking which mobile recharge offer to take? Enter an amount and tap on “Check Offer” button to see the best offers for you.
+ We have added new partners in some of our services. Follow the dots to check them out!
+ We have new tutorial videos in Discover bKash to help you. Follow the dot on bKash Menu.

+ Pay Titas (Metered) gas bill from bKash App, in addition to the Non-metered option.
+ We have added a new partner in Air Tickets, so that you can book domestic and international flights with ease.
+ Need help with your travel plans? Book hotels all across the country from the Travel section in bKash App.
+ There are some new tutorial videos in Discover bKash. Follow the dot on bKash Menu to find out more.
